txt.en: 'It's not my fault all these animals are loose, and I'm not going to be the one to gather them all up.'
'I just know I'm going to be the one blamed for this mess. How am I to cover the cost of all that lost livestock?'
'I wasn't even supposed to be the one to shepherd these beasts over to Bree, but that fool Digswell broke his leg.'
'You ask me the problem's with these Little Folk; Bree-hobbits know how to run their business.'
'How hard is it to just store goods going between Bree and the Shire across the river? '
